author: kodolova
body:
Corrections chain for JPT jets that used L1FastJetCalo as L1 offset corrections are modified. It uses now L1JPTOffsetCorrectorProducer with offsetService = cms.InputTag('ak4CaloL1FastjetCorrector').
ak4L1JPTFastjetCorrector is included in all JPT chains.
title: JPTJECbugfixV1
